definition: vigorously pursuing knowledge, while scrupulously abiding by the rules of decorum (idiom)
to make an appointment/to invite/approximately/pact/treaty/to economize/to restrict/to reduce (a fraction)/concise
to weigh in a balance or on a scale
surname Li/abbr. for 禮記|礼记[Li3 ji4], Classic of Rites
to study the underlying principle to acquire knowledge (idiom); pursuing knowledge to the end
to carry out (obligation) conscientiously/to behave sincerely
diligent and sociable (idiom); meticulous in work and dealing cheerfully with one's colleagues
